Game: The Adventures of Jimmy Neutron Boy Genius vs. Jimmy Negatron 2002-09-24T00:00:00-07:00 Jimmy Neutron Boy Genius has gotten himself in a completely new world of trouble, or should we say "new dimension of trouble?" In The Adventures of Jimmy Neutron, Boy Genius: Jimmy Neutron Vs Jimmy Negatron, Jimmy accidentally warps himself into a parallel dimension, switching places with his evil alter ego -- Jimmy Negatron! With Jimmy Negatron running loose in Retroville, Jimmy Neutron will need all of his inventions and smarts to figure a way back home, save his friends, and restore his town back to normal! <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/d60a670d-1c3c-44a5-b3d4-9ecba0b3c659.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/0496a599-dfa5-4c2e-b984-893a785c2d93.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/c9069e2e-722a-4e79-8afa-bd6e91b1473b.png Action HumanSoft THQ
